name: factcheck-backend
description: FactCheck Backend API with Firebase Authentication

scripts.stop: taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>nul && netstat -ano | findstr :5000 | findstr LISTENING >nul && for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :5000 ^| findstr LISTENING') do taskkill /f /pid %a 2>nul && echo "Cleared port 5000" || echo "Port 5000 is free"

author: FactCheck Team
